title: Illaoi fanart
body:
Hi, here's my take on Illaoi, hope you like it! ;)
If you want, follow my page on facebook even if it's mostly in italian (soz!) ^^"
[My page here!](https://www.facebook.com/The-Seneschal-1157532627597857/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel)
Enjoy! ^^

replies.body:
Oh wow. And I though I was a good artist. ~Crumples paper and tosses in the bin.~

Jokes aside, that is 97.5% gorgeous.

> [{quoted}](name=CrimsonCobra3,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-02T14:50:05.245+0000)
>
> Oh wow. And I though I was a good artist. ~Crumples paper and tosses in the bin.~
> 
> Jokes aside, that is 97.5% gorgeous.

Thank you so much! I guess 97.5% gorgeous's a pretty good score! ^^
Well, I'm sure you are a good artist, do you post your works somewhere?

> [{quoted}](name=Sandman Endless,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-02T15:01:52.852+0000)
>
> Thank you so much! I guess 97.5% gorgeous's a pretty good score! ^^
> Well, I'm sure you are a good artist, do you post your works somewhere?

I've never posted a lot of my art, however, I have uploaded some of my art purely for posting on these boards. The link is at the bottom if you want to see it. (And if I ever upload more of my art, that's probably where it will go.) 

And yes, 97.5% gorgeous is an amazing score. You only need 70%-80% to be classified as 'gorgeous.' I suppose giving you a percentage was still a bit of a joke... :)

Alright, I posted my art to pinterest, and I'm not sure if you can go directly to the board from the link I have access to, but this will take you to a pin on the board from which you should be able to access the board. (Called 'My Art'.) If it doesn't work, please tell me and I will try to fix it.
  
https://www.pinterest.com/pin/431993789237076732/

> [{quoted}](name=CrimsonCobra3,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-02T15:14:41.091+0000)
>
> I've never posted a lot of my art, however, I have uploaded some of my art purely for posting on these boards. The link is at the bottom if you want to see it. (And if I ever upload more of my art, that's probably where it will go.) 
> 
> And yes, 97.5% gorgeous is an amazing score. You only need 70%-80% to be classified as 'gorgeous.' I suppose giving you a percentage was still a bit of a joke... :)
> 
> Alright, I posted my art to pinterest, and I'm not sure if you can go directly to the board from the link I have access to, but this will take you to a pin on the board from which you should be able to access the board. (Called 'My Art'.) If it doesn't work, please tell me and I will try to fix it.
>   
> https://www.pinterest.com/pin/431993789237076732/

I've seen some of your works and studies, I think you are a good artist so hold on! ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Sandman Endless,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-02T19:48:23.390+0000)
>
> I've seen some of your works and studies, I think you are a good artist so hold on! ^^

Thank you!
"Nagakabouros wants YOU."
We need an Aunt Illaoi skin (after Dunkmistress of course)

> [{quoted}](name=charcharmunro,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-02T15:22:57.673+0000)
>
> "Nagakabouros wants YOU."

XDDD

That's really cool :D  I like the sense of movement you've given to her hair - very thematically appropriate, and the expression and gesture is very arresting.  That smirk too.

I have to point out, though, the thumbnail images looks like a really weird angry man with a comedy mustache and big nose!  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-03-03T23:32:33.208+0000)
>
> That's really cool :D  I like the sense of movement you've given to her hair - very thematically appropriate, and the expression and gesture is very arresting.  That smirk too.
> 
> I have to point out, though, the thumbnail images looks like a really weird angry man with a comedy mustache and big nose!  :D

Thank you so much! I tried to figure out the angry man but I really wasn't able to recognize it! XD

Now THIS is motion.

Illaoi is fast becoming my favorite character.

Kindred has my favorite art in game and out, Ekko has my favorite gameplay, and Tahm Kench has my favorite backstory (from what they revealed in his Q&A). I must admit, though, that Illaoi has some really awesome elements in all of these areas, and is one my favorite champions overall.
Badassss!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  It's soo shiny hahaha <3 <3 Keep up the amazing work!

> [{quoted}](name=Solaris Yuna,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-03-03T04:01:50.402+0000)
>
> Badassss!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  It's soo shiny hahaha <3 <3 Keep up the amazing work!

Yey! \o/ Thank you! ^^
I like it. Entrancing picture. Good job

> [{quoted}](name=Banuvan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-03-03T00:25:07.186+0000)
>
> I like it. Entrancing picture. Good job

Thank you so!
When i read Illaoi fanart i imagined something else entirely.

> [{quoted}](name=WadeWilson1337,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-02T15:20:54.552+0000)
>
> When i read Illaoi fanart i imagined something else entirely.

I haven't understood if you like my work or not but now I'm wondering about what you imagined ^^
{{champion:161}}
heh
On a scale from 1-10, you're a 9. I'm the 1 you need.

> [{quoted}](name=Sentinos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-03-02T22:29:10.745+0000)
>
> On a scale from 1-10, you're a 9. I'm the 1 you need.

Thanks for the high score! ;)
Her eyes are surprisingly gentle, given her personality. Just a thought, I like the underwater feel the green hues give.

> [{quoted}](name=Dengeden,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-02T18:30:59.152+0000)
>
> Her eyes are surprisingly gentle, given her personality. Just a thought, I like the underwater feel the green hues give.

Thank you! I see her like a big mom, so I can't think of her just as a rude person! I'm gald you noticed those little particulars ^^

THIS REMINDS ME OF THE MOVIE ATLANTIS
I LOEV IT

> [{quoted}](name=SirPancakeVII,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RAtAAsEZ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-03-02T19:19:02.476+0000)
>
> THIS REMINDS ME OF THE MOVIE ATLANTIS
> I LOEV IT

Thank you so much! I really love that movie too!
Move!

not enough tentacles

JK , good job
Not enough cowbell...

Wow, a League fanart of a female champ that doesn't include boobs.
...
Wait, she's controlling her tentacles into Ahri isn't she?
